mapper.select: select id as "Id",--系统自增加id syh as "Syh",--就诊唯一编号 icdcode as "IcdCode",--诊断代码 icdname as "IcdName",--诊断名称 diagdate as "DiagDate",--诊断日期 diagdoct as "DiagDoct",--诊断医生代码 remark as "Remark" --备注 from SI_MSDIAGINFO_MZ a,SI_MSSYINFO_MZ b where a.orgcode=b.orgcode and a.syh=b.syh and a.orgcode =#{map.Hoscode} and b.gendate>=to_char(#{map.beginDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and b.gendate<=to_char(#{map.endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
